what-bec.title: What is the BEC?
what-bec.text1: It`s a competition that provides a platform for young engineers to apply their knowledge and abilities in addressing real technical issues within the Case Study (CS) or Team Design (TD) categories.
what-bec.text2: Participants are students passionate about tackling contemporary challenges and developing innovative projects. The main goal of the event is to spark interest among youth in the advancement of engineering, raise a level of awareness of the field and foster the availability of skilled professionals in Ukraine.

subjects.text: — a category in which you need to propose a theoretical solution to a given engineering, economic, production, social, or marketing issue.
— to develop a plan of action that covers all the requirements and fits within a certain budget.
— a category in which participants are required to solve a practical issue in the field of IoT, embedded, electronics, radio engineering, or mechanics.
— to create a new device prototype or improve an old one using the materials provided.

about-best.title: About BEST Lviv
about-best.text: BEST Lviv (Board of European Students of Technology) is a local branch of an international non-profit student organisation that brings together students of technical specialties. Our mission is to develop students through the exchange of knowledge and collaboration between companies, universities, and students across Europe.

basket.title: Cart
basket.successMessage: The purchase letter has been successfully sent to the organizers, expect a reply!
basket.modalError3: Please enter a valid email address
basket.discontText1: on purchase three packages of proposals
basket.discontText2: for partner companies of EBEC`2021 and/or BEC`2023 (applies after the agreement of the organisers)
basket.discontText3: for each partner, that works in military and military-tech field of work (applies after the agreement of the organisers)

packets.title: Package of proposals
packets.discontText1: *10% of all funds will be transferred to support our army.
packets.discontText2: *The payment will proceed according to the NBU exchange rate.
packets.discontText3: *After the end of the competition each partner company will get a full report with all the photos and aftermovie.

points.description: Networking is an opportunity to communicate with representatives of other companies and competition participants in an informal atmosphere. Networking will take place on the day of the official closing of the competition.
Posting information about the company in 1 Instagram story on the @best_lviv page. The information will be posted after the competition.

points.text: Company banner at the event location
points.description: During the competition, you will have the opportunity to place a banner of your company at the event location. The company provides the banner and the stand for it.

points.text: Photo report and mention in the aftermovie
points.description: After the competition, each partner company will receive a report with all the company's photos. The company's logo will also appear at the end of the video, which will be created to summarize the event and posted on the Instagram page @best_lviv.

Networking is an opportunity to communicate with representatives of other companies and competition participants in an informal atmosphere. Networking will take place on the day of the official closing of the competition.
Posting information about the company in 2 Instagram stories on the @best_lviv page. The information will be posted after the competition.

points.text: Company banner at the event location
points.description: During the competition, you will have the opportunity to place a banner of your company at the event location. The company provides the banner and the stand for it.

points.text: Photo report and mention in the aftermovie
points.description: After the competition, each partner company will receive a report with all the company's photos. The company's logo will also appear at the end of the video, which will be created to summarize the event and posted on the Instagram page @best_lviv.
During the event, a large banner with the logos of our competition partners will be displayed.

points.text: Broadcasting of the company video at the event location
points.description: At the competition venue, a video of your company (up to two minutes) will be broadcast. The company provides the video.

Networking is an opportunity to communicate with representatives of other companies and competition participants in an informal atmosphere. Networking will take place on the day of the official closing of the competition.
Posting information about the company in 3 Instagram stories on the @best_lviv page and pinning it in highlights for 1 month. The information will be posted after the competition.

points.text: Company banner at the event location
points.description: During the competition, you will have the opportunity to place a banner of your company at the event location. The company provides the banner and the stand for it.

points.text: Photo report and mention in the aftermovie
points.description: After the competition, each partner company will receive a report with all the company's photos. The company's logo will also appear at the end of the video, which will be created to summarize the event and posted on the Instagram page @best_lviv.
During the event, a large banner with the logos of our competition partners will be displayed.

points.text: Broadcasting of the company video at the event location
points.description: At the competition venue, a video of your company (up to two minutes) will be broadcast. The company provides the video.
Placement of the company's logo on the official event website.
Posting information about the company in the Telegram channel BEST Lviv Students in a joint post along with other companies.

points.text: Distribution of company flyers at the event location
points.description: During the competition, participants will receive your company's flyers. This will help increase brand awareness and attract new customers. The company provides the flyers.

propositions.text: Sending out job vacancies via a Telegram bot
Access to the CV database of participants
Access to completed tasks of participants
A task from the company for the Case Study category
A task from the company for the Team Design category

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: Trial interview with participants
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: During networking, participants of the competition will have a chance to engage in a short interview with representatives from your company. This is an opportunity to discover new talents and prospective employees within the student community.

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: Sending out job vacancies via a Telegram bot
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: Semi-annual mailing of company vacancies in our Telegram bot, intended for registration, important announcements and communication during the event.

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: Video presentation of the company
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: The opportunity to present your company to the participants before the networking in the form of a video that will last up to 5 minutes.

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: Logo on T-shirts
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: Your company's logo will be printed on the T-shirts that will be given to the participants and representatives of the BEST Lviv organisation.

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: Access to the CV database of participants
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: This is an opportunity to access the CV database of participants.

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: Permanent access to competitions
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: Representatives of your company will have unrestricted access to the competition venue.

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: Access to completed tasks of participants
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: Opportunity to access participants' completed tasks.

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: A task from the company for the Case Study category
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: Your company will provide a task for the Case Study category. The task itself will be discussed and agreed upon with the organising team.

additionalPropositionsInfo.title: A task from the company for the Team Design category
additionalPropositionsInfo.description: Your company will provide a task for the Team Design category. The task itself will be discussed and agreed upon with the organising team.

opportunities.title: FOR COMPANY THE BEC — AN OPPORTUNITY TO

opportunities.text: Increase the recognition of your company among the student community
Encourage active young people of Ukraine interested in engineering to cooperate
Find new ideas to solve your problem
Meet talented students and select promising employees among them
Support the development of young engineers
